title: Vue 시작하기
snippet: 1. vue cli 설치하기npm install -g @vue/cli2. vue 프로젝트 생성vue create "프로젝트명"2. vue 프로젝트 실행npm run serve

title: nvm install node 이후 문제발생
snippet: ubuntu@ip-172-31-37-146:~$ node --versionnode: /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.28' not found (required by node)ubuntu@ip-172-31-37-146:~$ nvm install v10.13.0Downloading and installing node v10.13.0...Downloading https://nodejs.org/dist/v10.13.0/node-v10.13.0-linux-x64.tar.xz...########################################################################################################################################## 100.0%Computing checksum with sha256sumChecksums matched!Now using node v10.13.0 (npm v6.4.1)ubuntu@ip-172-31-37-146:~$ node --versionv10.13.0

title: AWS EC2에서 nodejs 설치하기
snippet: node version 관리자인 n모듈 글로벌로 설치sudo npm install -g n노드 버전 설치: sudo n [버전명]sudo n 12.16.1노드버전 확인sudo node --version
